CommandDefinition.Name: changeruntimecontextdependencies
CommandDefinition.ExtendedDescription: Changes the set of runtime context dependencies in a single atomic operation. Format for changes {ACTION}:{RUNTIME_CONTEXT_STRING_REPRESENTATION} {ACTION}: a or r for either addition or removal {RUNTIME_CONTEXT_STRING_REPRESENTATION}: either the name of the workspace, {APPLICATION_NAME}/{APPLICATION_VERSION} or {APPLICATION_DEFINITION_NAME}//{PARENT_WORKSPACE} Examples: ... -changes a:devel add a runtime context dependency to the devel workspace ... -changes r:prod/1.0 remove a runtime context dependency to the application 'prod' in version '1.0' ... -changes a:prod//devel add a runtime context dependency to the 'prod' application definition defined in the workspace 'devel' ... -changes r:prod/1.0 a:prod/2.0 replace the dependency to application 'prod' in version '1.0' with a dependency on the newer version '2.0'

Argument.Name: ownerApplicationName
Argument.Description: The name of the owner application.

Argument.Name: ownerVersionName
Argument.Description: The name of the owner application version.

Argument.Name: ownerWorkspaceName
Argument.Description: The name of the owner workspace.

Argument.Name: changes
Argument.Description: Specification of the changes to the owner runtime context.
